title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Learner-Centered LMS-Based Social Education Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can independently design a social education curriculum based on an LMS following a three-stage design process.
Learners can plan offline-online integrated activities by applying learner-centered experience principles.
Learners can operate an educational course centered on summative assessment using an evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
